name: LAPSORB CUP
description:
A racing game where you must absorb as many items as you can and do your best time to get the highest score. Compete for first place on the leader board and show off your driving skills.

This project was submitted to show the support of the team effiort, we feel short a programmer with the other portion of the game so the Audio and Modeling done by

Natalia.3D and EmmanuelPCP
